long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser Extension for make Indonesia News Websites more accessible for Visually Impaired Users. This Extension just repair accessibility problems on client-side and take a reference from Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1 published by W3C. For now this extension just change one websites for sample and that is www.tribunnews.com.
